  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Storekeeper",
  "description": "Prohuman Capital Consulting is a dynamic HR consulting firm dedicated to empowering organizations with comprehensive human resources expertise and strategic guidance. Founded on the principle that exceptional talent management drives business success, we partner with companies to navigate their most complex HR challenges and unlock their human capital potential. Our reach extends to companies in and around West Africa, where we do business with diverse organizations seeking strategic HR solutions. At Prohuman Capital Consulting, we believe that every organization is unique. Our consultative approach begins with understanding your specific business context, industry dynamics, and organizational culture. We then develop customized solutions that are practical, implementable, and measurable.


We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Storekeeper

Job Location:&nbsp;Ebute-Metta, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time



Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Storekeeper to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing our inventory and storage operations.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Manage communication with suppliers and clients
	Assist in preparing reports and maintaining records
	Oversee receiving, storing, and distributing inventory
	Conduct regular stock counts and maintain accurate inventory records
	Ensure proper storage conditions for food products
	Implement and maintain inventory tracking systems
	Assist in maintaining quality standards for stored products
	Monitor expiration dates and manage stock rotation
	Report any quality issues or discrepancies
	Coordinate with production and sales teams to ensure efficient stock flow
	Assist in organizing shipments and deliveries
	Maintain a clean and organized storage area


Requirements


	SSCE holder or OND in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field with&nbsp;2+ years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the food industry
	Must reside around Ebute-Metta or Yaba
	Proficiency in inventory management software and the Microsoft Office Suite
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills
	Excellent attention to detail and accuracK
	Good communication skills in English and local languages
	Knowledge of food safety and storage regulations is a plus




Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;prohumancapitalinfodesk@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Job Location: Ebute-Metta, Lagos

Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Storekeeper to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing our inventory and storage operations.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Manage communication with suppliers and clients
	Assist in preparing reports and maintaining records
	Oversee receiving, storing, and distributing inventory
	Conduct regular stock counts and maintain accurate inventory records
	Ensure proper storage conditions for food products
	Implement and maintain inventory tracking systems
	Assist in maintaining quality standards for stored products
	Monitor expiration dates and manage stock rotation
	Report any quality issues or discrepancies
	Coordinate with production and sales teams to ensure efficient stock flow
	Assist in organizing shipments and deliveries
	Maintain a clean and organized storage area


Requirements


	SSCE holder or OND in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field with 2+ years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the food industry
	Must reside around Ebute-Metta or Yaba
	Proficiency in inventory management software and the Microsoft Office Suite

	Excellent attention to detail and accuracK
	Good communication skills in English and local languages
